com.karangandhi.networking.utils

Class MessageHeader<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karangandhi.networking.utils.MessageHeader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The ID of the Message
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MessageHeader<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Creates the MessageHeader that is read from the stream before the Message body
